metadata.feature_description: Main connector interface for configuring Google Analytics tracking settings including tracking ID, domain, and admin tracking preferences.

steps.expected: Connectors page loads with list of available connectors
steps.actual: Connectors page loaded successfully showing all available connectors including Google Analytics 4

steps.action: Click Connect button on Google Analytics 4 connector
steps.expected: Configuration form expands with empty fields
steps.actual: Form expanded showing empty Measurement ID field and unchecked Track for Administrators checkbox

steps.expected: Value entered in textbox without errors
steps.actual: GA4 format value accepted in textbox
Success notification displayed: 'Item successfully saved.' Green checkmark appeared next to connector name

steps.action: Enter Universal Analytics tracking ID: UA-12345678-1
steps.expected: Value entered in textbox, potentially with deprecation warning
steps.actual: UA format value accepted in textbox. No warning message displayed in current UI implementation.

steps.expected: Configuration removed and connector returns to unconfigured state
steps.actual: Success notification displayed: 'Item successfully deleted.' Connector shows 'Connect' button again indicating unconfigured state

steps.action: Click Connect, leave Measurement ID empty, click Save
steps.actual: Error notification displayed: 'Tracking Code Cannot Be Empty'

steps.action: Enter special characters including script tags: <script>alert('XSS')</script>
steps.actual: Input accepted and saved without sanitization

steps.expected: Either error or sanitized value saved
steps.actual: Special characters saved as-is without validation or sanitization

issues: No input validation for special characters or XSS-like content. While this is stored in config files and not directly rendered, it represents a lack of input validation.

steps.action: Enter very long string (180+ characters) as Measurement ID
steps.actual: Long string accepted and saved without truncation or length validation

issues: No maximum length validation on tracking ID field

steps.action: Enter value G-TESTCANCEL in Measurement ID field

steps.expected: Form closes without saving, connector shows Connect button
steps.actual: Form closed, connector returned to unconfigured state showing Connect button

observations: The UI shows 'Google Analytics 4' but the underlying connector code is named 'GoogleAnalytics' - both UA and GA4 formats are supported
The warning message for Universal Analytics deprecation (UA-XXXXX format) mentioned in connector.js code was not visible in the current UI implementation
No client-side or server-side validation for tracking ID format (accepts any string as long as not empty)
No input sanitization for special characters including script tags
No maximum length validation on the Measurement ID field
The Domain Name configuration mentioned in the code is not exposed in the basic connector UI - may be available in Advanced Settings
Advanced Settings functionality exists in code (advancedSetting class) but no obvious way to access it was found in the tested UI
